entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 11:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
